contents:
PETITION FOR REINSTATEMENT
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 1994, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated May 4, 1994, the Petition for Reinstatement is granted.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., pétitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
